page.title: 19HOUSING IN THE DEARNE AREA
page.content: Most of the houses in{Goldthorpe}are {terraced houses,}while in{Bolton}the majority are{semi-detached}council houses. A lot of people have bought their houses from the{National Coal {Board. Many of the streets in Goldthorpe have been closed to cars and are now leisure areas with{gardens and seats. Two new private housing estates have been built by Weaver Brothers at Lowfield and West Bolton on land bought from local farmers. I live in a Council House on Carr Head Lane in Bolton. We had to move out of our house while the Council{modernised it. It took four weeks but now we have a new kitchen and bathroom. Barnsley Council have nearly finished all the houses on our street.
